page.name: Xylothian Xevret
page.description: You're not sure what a Xevret is, but this looks like it would make a pretty nice dagger. You can occasionally hear a whirring noise from the base of the blade though...

page.name: Ruins of Kordana
page.description: Rhubarb has sent you to the ruins in the center of Sho Nuff Island, to try and recover the item that pirates and ninjas have been warring over for centuries... The Wind Pearl

properties.name: Ruins of Kordana
properties.description: Rhubarb has sent you to the ruins in the center of Sho Nuff Island, to try and recover the item that pirates and ninjas have been warring over for centuries... The Wind Pearl
properties.complete: Drakath is behind the theft of the wind orb instead of the ninjas! The ruins are, in reality, the remains of a giant fighting machine! Things on Sho Nuff Island are not at all what they seem.
